name: QUAST! A Duck's Terrifying Journey
description:
What happens when you mix Atari's Adventure with a horrifying Duck Nightmare?

"QUAST! A Duck's Terrifying Journey"

THINGS TO KNOW:

  • QUAST is a portmanteau of QUACK and QUEST.
  • The current demo showcases the basic controls (think Atari Adventure with tighter movement and a larger world) and a few difficulty options, but there will be many more options and challenges in the final game!
  • You're a quack if you don't think ducks can be frightening (see what we did there?).
